results.definition: the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
examples: there was an understanding between management and the workers

results.definition: the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination
an inclination to support or be loyal to or to agree with an opinion
examples: I knew I could count on his understanding

results.definition: the cognitive condition of someone who understands
examples: he has virtually no understanding of social cause and effect

results.definition: characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy
